resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Werbung mittels einer modifizierten \"hosts\"-Datei blockieren. Deaktivieren um andere Apps hierfür zu verwenden oder wenn Probleme mit Apps auftreten.
Lockdown is disabled as keyguard isn\'t secure
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into recovery or bootloader
Display advanced restart options on secured lockscreen
Blur media media notification artwork background
Blur amount for media notification artwork
Fade percent for media notification artwork
Blur amount for lockscreen media artwork
Fade amount for lockscreen media artwork
Aktivieren oder Deaktivieren der Akku-LED bei niedrigen Akkustand im \"Nicht Stören\" Modus
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'Add\'
Umschalter für adaptive Helligkeit neben dem Schieberegler anzeigen
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Der Bildschirm bleibt aktiviert, solange die Kamera-Taste halb durchgedrückt gehalten wird
Langes Drücken und Loslassen startet die Kamera
Taschenlampe bei ausgeschaltetem Bildschirm durch langes Drücken der Ein-/Aus-Taste einschalten
Seek music tracks by long-pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Lautstärketasten tauschen, wenn das Gerät gedreht wird
Wake device by pressing the button
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Display navigation bar at bottom of screen
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Inverts the layout of the navigation bar and other items, such as the IME switcher
Enable pixel style animation for 2-button / 3-button navigation bar
Enabling this will disable hardware keys for navigation
Anordnung der Tasten für Anwendungsverlauf und Zurück tauschen
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Choose which status bar icons can be shown
Sekunden neben der Uhr in der Statusleiste anzeigen
Uhr ausblenden, wenn Launcher sichtbar ist
Uhr in regelmäßigen Abständen ausblenden und anzeigen
Sekundenanzahl bis zum Ausblenden der Uhr
Sekundenanzahl die gewartet wird, bevor Uhr ausgeblendet wird
Double-tap on the status bar to put device asleep
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down quick settings
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
Reboot after selecting a font to take effect
Unable to find a suitable activity to perform this action!
Font file does not have valid postscript table
Failed to copy font to cache
Swipe the clock to change font style
Spoof your device as different model for Netflix
Das Gerät als Pixel XL ausgeben (nur für die Google-Fotos-App), um unbegrenzt Fotos sichern zu können
Höhere FPS in bestimmten Spielen freischalten
Das Gerät als ein anderes Modell ausgeben (nur für ausgewählte Spiele), um höhere FPS freizuschalten
Geschätzte verbleibende Akkulaufzeit anzeigen, wenn verfügbar
Double-tap on the lock screen to put device asleep
App-Symbole für Benachrichtigungssymbole in der Statusleiste verwenden
Display the number of pending notifications
Show colored app icon instead of monochrome icons
Wenn komplett stumm (kein Klingelton oder Vibration)
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Merge signal and signal type icons
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Zeigt im Roaming-Betrieb den Indikator im Mobilnetz-Symbol
Ersetzt die LTE-Anzeigen in der Statusleiste durch 4G
Kreuzzeichen neben der Signalleiste anzeigen, wenn Daten deaktiviert wurden
Anpassen der Anzeige der Akkuleiste über der Statusleiste
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Voll → leer: Rot ← Grün ← Blau ← Rot
Voll → leer: Rot → Grün → Blau → Rot
Show indicator when any app uses mic or camera
Show indicator when any app uses location
Show indicator when device screen is projected
Zugriff auf Schnelleinstellungen nur bei entsperrtem Gerät
Versteckt die Schnelleinstellungen, wenn das Gerät gesperrt ist. Die Benachrichtigungsleiste wird nicht deaktiviert
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers. \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Allow accessing power menu on secure lockscreen
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Wählen Sie die Transparenz der Qs (benötigt System-UI Neustart)
Setup icon pack and weather service
Display current weather condition and temperature
Requires weather service to be enabled
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"

Tips: 

1. Users can install new icon packs from play store by searching for "Chronus icons".

2. Condition icon pack is used for weather icons on quick settings and sushi launcher at a glance.

3. Long press the QuickSettings weather view/logo/temperature to access weather settings with ease.
Display data usage summary in quick settings footer
Replace clear all notification text with material style floating button
Benachrichtigung bei Positionsänderung des Alert-Sliders anzeigen
Animation anzeigen, wenn das Gerät angeschlossen wird
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Whether to show edge light whenever ambient display is shown and not just for notifications
Show music ticker on Ambient Display during track change
Force apps to ignore notch space

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Note that in some cases it can result in unresponsive areas on touch screen
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Eine \"App beenden\"-Taste anzeigen, wenn eine Benachrichtigung lange gedrückt wird
Time to display heads up notifications
Zeige Heads-Up Benachrichtigungen nur für Telefon-, Messaging- oder Alarm-App
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Set the visualizer in center mirrored mode
Create other pulse and flip vertically
Show media output toggle when there is an active stream
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Allow running multiple instances of the same application in parallel
Control Google services and core apps

Before disabling Google services and core apps, you should disable \"Find My Device\" and 2-step verification on your Google account. It is strongly recommended to keep this setting enabled else apps dependent on Google components will be affected. If you run into any issues after changing this setting, perform a factory reset.
Display and customize current network traffic levels
Hide the traffic monitor when inactive
Duration after which speed is remeasured
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Display WiFi standard next to WiFi signal
Select a different accent color from your wallpaper
Make luminance and chroma selection affect background colors as well
Standard Aosp Layout für die Kopfzeile im Hauptmenü der Einstellungen verwenden
Hide the extra user profile card below the searchbar
Enable settings homepage messages that changes base on current time of the day
Custom header text for settings homepage banner (Leave empty for blank header text)
Enable random aesthetic settings dashboard banner/header images
Enable combined signal icons\n(WARNING: a soft reboot will occur upon enabling combined signal icons)
Show user switcher when unlocking secured device
Uhr in der Kopfzeile der Schnelleinstellungen anzeigen
Datum in der Kopfzeile der Schnelleinstellungen anzeigen
Display a dialog with data usage details on expanded qs panel
Hide media panel squiggle animation, after changing you need to switch music, pause music or move the progress bar to apply
Show System Info icon on Qs
Show label below icon instead next to icon
Show only icon for QS tiles
Enable vertical layout for QS tiles
Round for active tiles and Rounded Rectangle for inactive tiles
Show a Animation when show AoD
Keep UDFPS enabled when the screen is off
Zeigt Animation beim Erfassen deines Fingerabdrucks
Choose your favorite udfps pressed color
Enable custom UDFPS Icon from files
Select custom image from your saved files or gallery
This is test for selected toast animation
Enable music card in volume panel
Show brightness percentage text in brightness slider
Optimize device power consumption and performance
Disable Wi-Fi on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Bluetooth on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Mobile data on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Location on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled

Tips: 

1. Game Boost will only activate when a game is active - requires app to be added on GameSpace list.

2. Runtime power mode will override system power mode.

3. Idle Sensor Block will prevent certain motion sensors from working properly.
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
